s: March 26, 2024 - Davids toothpaste isn’t completely waste-free. Its screw caps are HDPE plastic, so depending on where you live, you may or may not be able to put it in your recycling bin. Every Davids tube bought through retailers other than Davids comes with a steel tube key, which, while theoretically recyclable, is unnecessary once you’ve purchased your first tube.
